name: Life Of a Chrysanthemum (3 Days)
description: A debug view of the project: "Life of a Chrysanthemum". For three days, I scanned the same flower, documenting its life and decline to capture the beauty of natural imperfection. The video shows the first three days of photogrammetry scans and how time changes the flower's structure. The project is not a scientific representation of the subject but a romanticised one.
